reviewText: I had hopes that this release was one that I had seen on TV, I believe in late Jan-early Feb of this year.  The actor playing Kiki Camarena was different, Hector Berrellez the ex-DEA agent who investigated the case was interviewed, and the interviews of family members were also a bit different.  I have been trying to get hold of that "alternative version" and can't find it.  This one was not it.
